name: Zbuki Zoo Strategic Comedy
description:
Description


Resources are limited. Explore the map and harvest as much as you can.
Uset them to build facilities, hire talents and recruit troops.
Each type of facility has different set of creatures, plus distinctive set of structures to build.

You can play campaign, single scenario or multiplayer map.
To win a map, finish its main mission. To improve your final score, solve side tasks.

Game tempo is configurable

  • turn-based or real-time battles (several modes available)
  • real-time exploration
  • few pre-configured speeds to choose from

Key Featuers


  • Explore Zbukiland maps and discover hard to find secret locations.



  • Gather and manage resources; use them to recruit troops and talents.



  • Lead your armies to victory



  • Be rewarded by elaborate scoring system.



Have fun and let the Zbuki be with you!
